scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && mkdir -p dist/crms/prisma && ncp src/crms/prisma/schema_example.prisma dist/crms/prisma/schema_example.prisma && ncp ./prisma-generate-build.sh dist/prisma-generate-build.sh && chmod +x ./dist/prisma-generate-build.sh && ./dist/prisma-generate-build.sh && node ./dist/crms/index.js
scripts.pubs: rm -rf dist && tsc && ncp src/crms/prisma dist/crms/prisma && npm publish
